scripts.storybook:react: cd storybook-react && npm install && npm run storybook
scripts.storybook:vue: cd storybook-vue && npm install && npm run storybook
scripts.build-storybook:react: cd storybook-react && npm install && npm run build-storybook
scripts.build-storybook:vue: cd storybook-vue && npm install && npm run build-storybook
scripts.deploy:react: cd storybook-react && npm install && npm run build-storybook && npx chromatic --project-token=${REACT_STORYBOOK_TOKEN}
scripts.deploy:vue: cd storybook-vue && npm install && npm run build-storybook && npx chromatic --project-token=${VUE_STORYBOOK_TOKEN}
